channel.title: It begins again
channel.description: So..I've started logging into the game in places other than the place I logged off at. I logged on one time to get put right in the middle of Tarkoff's mob killer and get blown up by a creeper, and just now I logged in stuck in a wall. Anyone else having problems with this lately?

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:9, topic:443497”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=546179.msg4005320#msg4005320 date=1338572960]
The container lag is part of the anti-xray mod that was installed on the server. No containers will load unless you’re right in front of them.
[/quote]It’s annoying as hell, but it’s for a good cause.[/quote]
It is annoying :3

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:8, topic:443497”]The container lag is part of the anti-xray mod that was installed on the server. No containers will load unless you’re right in front of them.[/quote]It’s annoying as hell, but it’s for a good cause.

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

The container lag is part of the anti-xray mod that was installed on the server. No containers will load unless you’re right in front of them.

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

I get the same thing with the chests, furnaces, etc

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:5, topic:443497”]Anyone else getting a large amount of container lag? Example being that chests, crafting tables and furnaces don’t load unless you are right infront of them.[/quote]Yes, and they act exactly like what you said.

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Anyone else getting a large amount of container lag? Example being that chests, crafting tables and furnaces don’t load unless you are right infront of them. Also going back to topic I have fallen through the world and suffocated in walls numerous times upon logging in

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

Yup. Started happing to me last week. but its getting more frequent.

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

zuppers:

I noticed when I logged in the last two times I was about 2-3 blocks below where I was and start to suffocate.

Read full topic

item.title: It begins again
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I noticed when I logged in the last two times I was about 2-3 blocks below where I was and would* start to suffocate.

Read full topic
